Case 1:10-cr-00330-AKH Document 142 Filed 02/06/15 Page 14 of 15
By signing this Addendum, Epstein asserts and certifies that the above has been read and explained to him. Epstein hereby states that he understands the clarifications to the Non-Prosecution Agreement and agrees to comply with them.
R. ALEXANDER ACOSTA
UNITED STATES ATTORNEY
Dated: 10/30/07
By: A. MARIE VILLAFANA
ASSISTANT U.S. ATTORNEY
Dated: ____________________
JEFFREY EPSTEIN
Dated: ____________________
GERALD LEFCOURT, ESQ.
COUNSEL TO JEFFREY EPSTEIN
Dated: 10-29-07
LILLY ANN SANCHEZ, ESQ.
ATTORNEY FOR JEFFREY EPSTEIN
DOJ-OGR-00002625

additional_notes: The document appears to be a scanned copy of a signed addendum to a Non-Prosecution Agreement. The document is mostly typed, with some handwritten dates and signatures. The quality of the scan is good, and the text is legible.
